website_summaries.verdict: These fit-over amber glasses are ideal for those who wear prescription glasses for computing or gaming.
pros: Designed to fit over most frame styles
Blue-blocking tint is not just a coating
Thin polymer lenses add minimal weight to the wearer's original frames
cons: Frames are flimsy, nose pieces and bridge can fall off
Amber color is dark, may trigger eye strain

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable. But good news. This company cares and wanted to know about problems and helped me. Even though this product was a bust for me, I would try their products. Not very often are you treated with respect and this company did that for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 pairs of these glasses. The first pair I bought at christmas. They broke apart in the middle within the first month. I ordered a second pair and they also fell apart in the middle within the first month. I took them off and set them on the counter. They actually just split in half. These are very poorly made glasses. Edit to review.....After my original post above, ElementsActive refunded my glasses and issued a very sincere apology. I appreciate the prompt and courteous service. The glasses still suck but the customer service is above par. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: andi

customer_reviews.title: Does not block blue light. Looking at a blue ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not block blue light. Looking at a blue LED should render the LED black or white with a true blue light blocker. These render a blue LED a slightly dimmer blue.
customer_reviews.author: STR

customer_reviews.title: Great for Insomnia
customer_reviews.text: Really amazing for eye strain and blocking blue light before bed. I start wearing them about an hour before going to sleep and they've helped so much with my now former sleep issues. They're really comfortable with or without my prescription glasses, although I prefer without but either way, they feel light on the face.
customer_reviews.author: Shoegal

customer_reviews.title: Blocks blue light, but very big.
customer_reviews.text: They block blue light really well and I noticed a difference in how well rested I've been (see studies on sleep disturbance from exposure to blue light in hours before bed time). Just know that they are really big and you'll probably feel goofy wearing them in public. I would like something that covers my peripheral vision more, but then they'd look more goofy.
customer_reviews.author: Josh M

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Fit great, both on myself and my husband. I have quite a small head and he has quite a large head, yet they seem to work for both of us. Fits over your glasses comfortably. Really cuts down on the blue light so we both sleep much better. The only downside (of any orange glasses) is that the colors are much harder to see on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Book fans

customer_reviews.title: Cheap construction. Breaks too easily.
customer_reviews.text: Broke in two at nose piece in less than one-month of use. Cheap plastic construction.
customer_reviews.author: John N. Thornburg

customer_reviews.title: Work till they don't
customer_reviews.text: Loved these glasses, but one star as they broke at the nose piece after 3 months of use. How do I get a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but quality lacks
customer_reviews.text: The lens appears good. I can read at night without the blue light. It's not too dark. They do fit well over my regular-sized glasses. I don't know about their claim that it's indestructible though. It came with one of the arms detached. Then two days later the other one fell off when I was just picking it up. They're easy to attach back, but I have no doubt they will fall off again and over time they will become looser and looser (I may update this if that's the case). Overall, I think this might be an okay buy, but it does seem pricey for the overall quality and robustness of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: my functional medicine doctor has recommended blue blocking over glasses "goggles" for me & I ...
customer_reviews.text: my functional medicine doctor has recommended blue blocking over glasses "goggles" for me & I have tried many others (besides these) -- the other amber blue blocking "goggles" I've tried have been clunky, uncomfortable fitting & generally not easy to wear -- this is the 1st pair of blue blocking "goggles" I've found anywhere that actually do the job (the amber color is right, in some the amber color is too dark) & they also fit comfortably over my glasses -- I'm about to order 2 more right now -- keep up the good work & I look forward to any other products you have or bring out
customer_reviews.author: Nigel's Books

customer_reviews.title: Fragile plastic frames
customer_reviews.text: After just a few weeks of use, the plastic snapped at the bridge. Great lenses, poor frames. UPDATE: I received a full refund from ElementsActive. They apologized and took responsibility for the poor plastic frames. They are in development to fix this issue and I look forward to the release of their new product which I intend to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zach P

customer_reviews.title: They actually work
customer_reviews.text: At the risk of sounding like a nut case, I must admit there seems to be something to the claim that wearing these glasses while watching TV or using computer will help you sleep at night. I dismissed the notion that using these would help, but I ordered them hoping they would help with eye fatigue, which they do. Within a few days of wearing these for only a couple hours each day, I started sleeping 7-8 hours per night instead of my usual 4-5. I am now a converted skeptic. They come with a Satisfaction Guarantee so it makes it easy to give them a try.
customer_reviews.author: Tim S.

customer_reviews.title: smart phones, TV
customer_reviews.text: I have ben having a hard time sleeping at night. I bought these glasses after I read that blue light from computers, smart phones, TV. etc., interferes with our bodies making melatonin and thus some of us have a hard time going to sleep at night. I now use these glasses and I have been sleeping better. I sometimes put them over my prescription glasses and I sometimes just wear these glasses. They are comfortable either way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Apparently satisfaction is NOT guaranteed....disappointing policy
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are too big, so I wanted to return them, but "satisfaction guaranteed" claim and Amazon Prime apparently DON'T add up to free returns. Cost of return is nearly $7! Buyer beware...
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: orange lens comforting to eyes
customer_reviews.text: My young adult son REALLY likes these as they are more orange than the pair he had been using that were a bit tight over his glasses. These that we just got give him better clarity and his eyes felt good using the other glasses but now they feel GREAT, using these. No eye strain!! And these fit over his prescription glasses nicely with room to spare. They are more comfortable than his previous pair. He automatically puts them on before using the computer now.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B

customer_reviews.title: Get a better night's sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I agree with others who have reviewed them. VERY comfy over my own glasses. Watched about 2 hours of TV with them on and I really like the way the blue is removed from images making the images even more pleasing. And the quality of sleep I received was great. Didn't even get up in the middle of the night. These glasses make it super easy to navigate through all of your evening activities. Reading is great with these. P.S. Consider these before even considering blackout window shades.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J.

customer_reviews.title: Help me sleep better!
customer_reviews.text: If I'm looking at my phone or watching TV before bed, I notice that I'm less wired when I wear these, and my eyes are less tired. Blue light can throw my sleep cycle off, but when I wear these I sleep much better! I also tried a pair of less tinted glasses (the ones that look like eyeglasses), but I think these make more of a difference. Sure, they're not very inconspicuous, but they are dependable for their purpose. I love that they fit over my glasses and I can also wear them with contacts, a win-win!
customer_reviews.author: The Elegant Redhead

customer_reviews.title: Better than sleeping pills
customer_reviews.text: I have problems falling to sleep. Read an Article on helpful hints on what to do & not do to eliminate the problem. I’m on my phone & IPAD every evening, and that was one of those not to do hints! It wasn’t going to happen in this lifetime, so the next best thing was to purchase a pair of glasses. The first day, I started wearing the glasses over my regular glasses. Before I knew it, I forgot that I had them on. From that first night & thereafter, I couldn’t tell you when I went to sleep. Best thing I ever did!
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Linda

customer_reviews.title: I'm Sold!
customer_reviews.text: I now use these glasses when I watch TV at night. Even after my iPhone goes to night mode, I still wear them. I have had them less than a week, and it is like a miracle. I can be on the internet until almost midnight, get ready for bed and be asleep within in minutes, sleeping more soundly. Before these glasses, I would be wide awake because of all the blue light stimulation. I seldom write rave reviews, but these glasses work wonders! Even more perfect if you wear glasses when you use the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Transterrra

customer_reviews.title: Look funny but they work
customer_reviews.text: These work. I was getting dizzy spells, blurred vision and ringing in my ears...some one told me about the negative effects of LED and fluorescent lights and that 's what was causing my problems. It's the blue light in LEDs that are the culprit (and the high speed pulsing) I wear these glasses when I have to go into environments that use lots of LEDs. They look funny but I don't care. Rather save my vision and hearing than impress onlookers. The symptoms went away after two days of wearing these and getting rid of all LEDs and turning on the amber 'sleep' setting on my computer screens.
customer_reviews.author: P Ray

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I had a $120 pair of another brand. Compared to my $120 pair, these are far superior. they are so light you feel nothing-I no longer have to use eyeglass pads on my regular glasses or stuff tissue between the glasses and the bridge of my nose. My eyes are no longer tired, my daily headaches and bi-weekly migraines are gone, since wearing these. I use technology every waking minute except when I driving or bathing-I wear them all day. My co-workers who also had the same $120 set tried them, and immediately ordered a pair. Amazing product
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D.

customer_reviews.title: Effective and work with different tupes og glasses
customer_reviews.text: For me amber lenses (and I like the darker ones) just plain work. I've got macular degeneration in the family and blue light is implicated in contributing to that condition, and I use these for that reason in addition to all the others. I use them for computer, TV, night and day driving, some LED light, and just any exposure to light with a strong blue element (like bright days outside.) What I like most about these particular glasses is that they fit over a lot of different glasses. I have prescription glasses for reading, distance, sun, and bi-focal. I can use these with any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Gunderman

customer_reviews.title: Good solution, but handle with care
customer_reviews.text: These glasses do seem to filter quite a bit of blue light out of my screens at night. I work from home and have to work until the wee hours of the night, just before I go to bed. I did notice a slight sleep quality improvement once I started using these. I have given them three stars because they are kind of flimsy. They fit over my glasses nicely, but they broke within a week when one of the arms snapped off and from the start the lenses made a sort of torquing sound when I put them on that made my fear the lenses would fall out, although they never got the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain_Hunter

customer_reviews.title: How do you spell relief? These computer glasses..
customer_reviews.text: Fair price and an amazing effect: new job had me doing 30+ online compliance trainings..under harsh fluorescent office lighting. My eyes so red I may as well stayed up night before doing beer bongs since that’s what I looked like at work anyway. Put these glasses on, looked at the monitor and immediately felt so much stress leave my body —it had been so painful I was squinting and frowning w/o realizing it. Jammed thru those computer trainings in a breeze w/ these on. Fits nicely over my prescription glasses too, and they don’t scare anyone walking into my cubicle.
customer_reviews.author: 2K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the cockpit
customer_reviews.text: I wear prescription lenses and recently started flying. I've been looking for lenses that I can wear over my glasses that fit under my headset, cut haze, sharpen contrast, and still allow me to read the instrument panel. Most glasses that cut haze are dark enough that I can't read the electronic instruments. These lenses do what I need. I've only worn them one day and will add additional feedback if I learn anything new after wearing them more.
customer_reviews.author: Dogu

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for those of us who still choose to wear eyeglasses!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are light and cover my glasses so that I am completely protected. I like them so much I have given away two other pairs as gifts. I barely know I'm wearing them except for the slight amber tint of the world around me :-)
customer_reviews.author: K Johns

customer_reviews.title: Blue light fitovers
customer_reviews.text: since I am having more dry eye & sleep issues lately I thought I would try the blue light glasses & the fitovers would be perfect since I have prescription glasses. I am getting used to using these for computer use & feel that they are helping my eyes. I am still not sure on using them for computer use while I am also watching tv. These are lightweight & pretty sturdy in fitting over my prescription glasses. All in all I think this is a good purchase for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: They work decently to block the blue light, but the arms fall off easily due to how cheap they are (they fall off when handling them, not wearing them). They're easy to put back on but eventually I think the super cheap plastic will get worn down and the arms will no longer be able to stay on. It's unfortunate that there aren't very many options for blue light blocking glasses that go over existing glasses. The arms also dig into my ears and hurt after a while and no way to adjust them due to the ultimate level of cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: A co worker recommended these because I was having problems with insomnia. Every night a couple of hours before bedtime, I put them on as I'm walking around my home. So far, with the combination of a happy light every morning, and these every night, I've been sleeping great. Wake up feeling rested, and my eyes don't feel fatigued. Recommend for anyone who watches, TV, smart phones, or computers. Great price, and they feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Salzoom

customer_reviews.title: These can help you sleep better. Add them to good sleep hygiene practices.
customer_reviews.text: These glasses fit well over my prescription glasses. Wearing amber lenses starting two hours before my bedtime (to start building the melatonin) makes a positive difference with my sleep. I’ve had clip-one and thought I would try these. Both seem to allow me a deeper sleep with fewer awakenings in the middle of the night. I tend to sleep straight through, now, and if I do wake up, I go back to sleep quickly. I also practice good sleep hygiene.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W.

customer_reviews.title: Seems as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I received this product overnight. I have only used the glasses for 3 nights for watching tv and playing on my iPad while in bed. It's a little soon to tell, but I did seep quite well last night, compared to a few nights before. I use a sleeping mask once I remove the glasses to go to sleep. Seems to be a good combo. Couldn't rate sturdiness yet time will tell. I'm happy with this product so far—it's light-weight, attractive, and easy to slip on over my glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Change

customer_reviews.title: Great lenses, Cheap frames
customer_reviews.text: I really liked them at first. The lenses do block blue light. Within a few minutes of putting them on, I was yawning! They also for well over my glasses (thicker plastic frames). It would get a little heavy after a few hours but I got used to it after a few days. But after a few short weeks, the frame cracked. It’s made of cheap plastic to make it lightweight. I’m very careful with glasses. I did not drop them. I kept them in the case to prevent scratches. But when putting them on earlier this week, it cracked right in the middle. I’m so disappointed. It would be 5 stars otherwise. :(
customer_reviews.author: Ellie W.

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: They fit over my regular glasses, and they do not add uncomfortable weight to my ears even after hours of wear. I have enjoyed wearing these glasses everyday since purchasing them, and they really do help my eyes! If you watch a lot of Netflix or even when you're spending a couple hours on social media, wearing these will save your precious eyes. No more blurry vision or dry eyes! Highly recommend. Oh and you get used to the orange tint. I forget the tint is even there after wearing them for so long.
customer_reviews.author: Jenjenniferlynn

customer_reviews.title: eyes feel rested - fit well over larger glasses
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's my mind or not... I started wearing these in bed at night (sometimes over glasses sometimes by themselves). My eyes feel much better - not tired and and I'm not rubbing them anymore. I got a pair for a friend who is having eye problems. She wears them working on the computer and feels they have helped make her eyes feel... more rested. Hard to explain. I'm ordering more for xmas presents. :)
customer_reviews.author: M. B.

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: Before I had these glasses I was up ALL night reading, drawing, playing on the computer, you name it, and I could never get to sleep - never got that "it's sleepy-time now" feeling, ya know? Now - OK I still stay up a little while and read some, but I get that message loud and clear, the one you can't deny - YOU ARE GOING TO SLEEP...NOW! and you DO! I've been sleeping so well, I wonder what my life would look like now if I'd had these all along. Wow, whoever created these, you're a genius - THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara S. Early

customer_reviews.title: Do not block out much blued light
customer_reviews.text: I bought these supposed very effective anti blue light blocking over glasses and never really used them because they seemed cumbersome. So recently I began using them and got used to wearing them over my glasses and found that they are not very effective at blocking out the blue light of my laptop or any over blue light emitting device. The deep amber color was supposed to be very effective, but it's not. Also, the quality of the plastic is not very good at all and feel like they'll break with minimum wear and one of the lenses is not fitted right. Won't buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Really an eye saver!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad my son recommended these glasses to me. As a photographer I do a lot of work on the computer, and quite late at night. I had been having a very difficult time falling asleep, sometimes a few hours. After using the glasses for about a week, that sleep problem is no more. I fall asleep quickly and stay asleep. AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul M

customer_reviews.title: These things really work
customer_reviews.text: I work on the computer a lot and my eyes are going bad. After a few hours, I would be exhausted from eyestrain. My wife is the same way, so I got her a pair of these glasses. I was skeptical, but they worked very well for her, so I started wearing them over my magnifying glasses (which I always wore before). I see so much better and I can work for hours without tiring at all. I ordered a pair of my own. I recommend them wholeheartedly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, good protection
customer_reviews.text: These glasses fit over my very-wide glasses (about 138mm) very well. They appear to be well made, and are comfortable. The amount of protection is good, as based on online testing (just Google "test my blue light blocking glasses"). I do have a pair that is a little better in terms of protection, but they are very uncomfortable, cut into my face, and are difficult to take off and put on. I would rather get a little less protection with glasses I will be compliant in wearing, as opposed to better protection from glasses that I never wear! Overall, very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: They Work - and New Version Might Be More Durable
customer_reviews.text: Like others have said, the glasses work! That said, the plastic used for the frames is fragile. First pair broke - emailed company - received a full refund and a discount for another pair. Use them every day - and so far - no issues, although, to be fair, I'm a lot more careful with them than I was the first time. Just received an email from company - new, stronger plastic being used now - along with a coupon for a discount to try them. Just ordered new version. Very good (potentially great) product and value. Definitely great company.
customer_reviews.author: bill burns

customer_reviews.title: The only downside is that they aren't as comfortable as regular-sized glasses
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed a difference since I got these and began to wear them. I didn't realize how much blue light was probably screwing with my circadian rhythms until I put these on and began to wear them frequently. Now I find my body is ready to sleep typically 2-3 hours earlier and if I don't wear these I notice that change as well as occasional headaches and such. The only downside is that they aren't as comfortable as regular-sized glasses. I got them to go over my prescription glasses, so it may just be that I have to suffer through that part of it unless I can one day afford prescription blue light blocking glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Rand Ulfsson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. I wish I'd known about blue-blocking glasses a long time ago!
customer_reviews.text: These were the only reasonably priced blue-blocking glasses I could find that would both fit over prescription glasses and receive high blue-blocking ratings (I checked other sources that I hope were good). Once you wear them, if you glance at a computer screen without them you'll see what a glare your poor eyes were suffering from before. I don't know yet if they'll help with the biorhythm problem. I'm going to recommend these to everyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: D. H. White

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth a try to reduce eye tiredness and improve sleep
customer_reviews.text: I noticed the first day when I wore them for about 4 hours while working on the computer at work that my eyes were not bleary feeling as they would usually feel. I am also wearing them at night when I watch TV for about 2 hrs. After wearing them for 3 days my sleep is better as I am able to fall asleep faster. Will continue to wear them while on computer or watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: Luisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Well, these do work, and they do fit over my regular glasses, but they are cheaply made. They haven't broken yet, but the temples and lenses come apart frequently and I have to carefully put them back together. It's only a matter of time. They are worth about $3, not the $20 I paid. Perhaps a pair of cheap yellow sunglasses from a gas station would work as well. Those recyclable 3D glasses from the movies are better made.
customer_reviews.author: Mortimer Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: no room under them for another pair of glasses
customer_reviews.text: These would not fit over any glasses in our household, I am wearing them like regular glasses and there is no room under them for another pair of glasses....I had already bought a pair for myself so these were not useful to us as I had bought them for my son who wears glasses. Maybe if you were a small person with wire rims...I was able to return them for no shipping and the company contacted me also to offer a full refund without need of returning product or credit on their other products. I would give the company a 5 star rating, but this is a product rating.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna Davis

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to use
customer_reviews.text: Too much orange, makes my eyes strained more. Impossible to use.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: I didn't realize
customer_reviews.text: Just got these a few days ago. They fit well over my prescription glasses. I've been using them for several nights and although they say not to look at electronic devices before bed, I can't help myself. So far , I have felt the filter of the glasses to be very effective. I find my eyes are not as uncomfortable and I can easily get to sleep after I have watched a video or read emails. Hoping to protect my eyes and health for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Red Robin

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses fit comfortably over my rather large prescription glasses/frames. I'm on the computer late a night, and this helps me not to stay up all night due to the blue light. I threw these glasses in my suitcase not long after I got them and the left temple (side piece that slides over your ear) popped off while my suitcase was in transport. I was able to easily reattach it - it popped right back on. I'm very happy with the glasses. They deliver what they promise.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Well priced and nicely effective. Disappointed after using them less than a month
customer_reviews.text: I received these few days ago and have used them every evening. I tried other blue blocker glasses. Although they did block some I can tell these block more of the blue light from screens. They significantly reduce eye strain . Thank you May 22, 2019 I received these Apil 30th and as I said at first I was very satisfied with them. I lay on one side or the other to watch any media in the evening these bows started popping off a week ago and now they won't even pop back on.
customer_reviews.author: Peace

customer_reviews.title: Immediate relief from screen glare
customer_reviews.text: I only use these at work so I'm not sure if they are helping me sleep better at night. I bought them mainly because, like most people, I don't blink my eyes enough working on my computer all day. I took to using eye drops which helped. These glasses seem to make me more aware of the strain on my eyes and I find myself blinking more and using eyedrops less. Maybe psychological. Nevertheless, one of the best things I've ever bought! I actually look forward to putting them on at work to take the strain off my eyes. So far, one week in, an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Garrett

customer_reviews.title: FIT WELL, LOOK NICE BUT...
customer_reviews.text: These fitovers fit comfortably over my readers but I wish they blocked out as much blue light as the UVEX Skyper blueblockers that I have. The UVEX is not fitover though, so I cannot read with them. It appears that the ELEMENTS ACTIVE over glasses Anti Blue Blockers are the best fitovers that I can find and the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Donna K

customer_reviews.title: No more eye pain
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of computer work, often 8 hours a day almost straight. Sometimes by hour 6, I cannot bear to look at the screen and the light is painful. This has been a blessing! I can finish my work and not worry about the eye strain or the need of a nap just to end the eye pain of keeping my eyes open. I can focus SEE what I am doing. Most of my errors are in the last hour or two of work and it is because can't see what I am doing. Thank you for these glasses!
customer_reviews.author: M. H. Fayad

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY COMFORTABLE.  DO NO REALIZE THAT I AM WEARING THEM.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS PRODUCT. THE GLASSES ARE LIGHT IN WEIGHT AND FIT VERY WELL. THEY EASE MY EYE STRAIN WHILE WATCHING TV OR USING MY PHONE AND COMPUTER. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THEM. LOVE EVERYTHING ABOUT THEM. I AM VERY PLEASED WITH THIS PURCHASE AND WOULD RECOMMEND THEM TO EVERYONE WHO SUFFERS FROM TIRED EYES WHEN USING THE COMPUTER, PHONE AND TV. THANK YOU FOR THE YEAR WARRANTY. ALSO, THY ARE EASILY WARN OVER PRESCRIPTION GLASSES. - ANOTHER PLUS.
customer_reviews.author: Judith alsing

customer_reviews.title: Great blue light blocking glasses.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these glasses compared to a similar pair I had before. The reason I got these is that I needed something to wear over my reading glasses. These fit over all my various readers. After a while, the bridge of my nose gets kind of sore, but since I only wear them before bed when reading on my phone or computer, I don’t wear them too terribly long. I like the case they came in, so they don’t get scratched when I put them away in my night stand.
customer_reviews.author: my3suns

customer_reviews.title: Reduces eyestrain by a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally review products on Amazon but I feel like this deserves a review. Being a PhD student, I have to spend a lot of time on my computer reading and writing and the blue light makes reading PDFs for long periods of time very difficult. My friend recommended these glasses to me and so I decided to try it. I have fairly big glasses frame and still this computer glasses was able to fit perfectly over it. I can see words on my computer much more clearly and my eyes does not feel that tired at all. I highly recommend this to people who spend long periods of time on the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Ming

customer_reviews.title: Work's as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have read a lot of hipe on blue blight blocking glasses and where lies the real truth. I purchase a beautiful prism to separate white light to be able to view blue light in its purest form. Looking at the spectrum I noticed that these glasses definitely and unequivocally perform as designed. They strongly reduced the level of dangerous blue light. Unfortunately several other glasses I purchased did not perform as specified.
customer_reviews.author: Pourboire

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for use over prescription eyeglasses
customer_reviews.text: Very good for use over your prescription eyeglasses. Not at all bulky or heavy. These do a great job blocking blue light while using a computer especially during night time. Not suitable as sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Lacourse

customer_reviews.title: Stylish even
customer_reviews.text: As someone who spends a lot of time online, I began to experience ocular migraines about a year ago, and these glasses were recommended in addition to reducing the screen intensity. They go comfortably over my prescription glasses, and I was surprised that I get compliments in spite of the necessarily unflattering lens color. I wasn't having sleep problems, so I don't know how they work for that.
customer_reviews.author: Yours Truly

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I've only worn these a couple of times while watching TV right before bed, which normally results in a poor night's sleep but both nights when I wore these I got a good night's rest. I'll keep "experimenting" with them but I think I have a winner! I do have insomnia and take medication to help but that's a constant in the equation.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy! Quality not there for the price paid!
customer_reviews.text: I liked how clear things look when outside. The quality isn't good! I disliked how flimsy these blue light blocking eyeglass frames were! You barely touch them and the arms unsnap. You have to hold them very lightly to clean them, because they feel as though they'll break in your hands! They're not comfortable behind your ears over eyeglasses! Not worth the price paid for them.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Reece

customer_reviews.title: I love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. I use them every night when I'm on the computer and when I go to bed, I fall asleep faster.. They are very nice glasses and so comfortable I forget I have them on. They also come in a nice little draw string bag that helps protect them from scratches. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: P Scott

customer_reviews.title: They're comfortable and fit well...
customer_reviews.text: ...even though they look really silly. Everything on the computer and phone screen looks really, really blue when I take them off. Otherwise everything is orange-hued. It's only my first day of wearing them so we'll see how they hold up over time. Finally, a quip about the delivery (I believe it's Amazon's van, not delivery via USPS or UPS): it delivered to the WRONG ADDRESS. Thankfully the neighbors dropped off the package, sealed in its box and mailing sleeve, to our place.
customer_reviews.author: Ajazi

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: My husband read in a recent AARP magazine that this type of lens would help me sleep. I have had problems sleeping for at least the last 20 years and didn't believe they would do anything. I have had these glasses only four days: however, the last four days I have had more energy, decreased my 4-mile run by a couple of minutes and my resting heart rate is lower. They fit great and are comfortable. I am going to recommend these to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Yoga Cat

customer_reviews.title: Better sleep is golden.
customer_reviews.text: These help me sleep, as I put them on when I turn the lights on in my house. I do suffer from migraines but have not had one since I got these, could be them or just a no migraine time. I have a small head and rarely ware them with my glasses, so they poke out from the back of my head and rest against my face creating a nice crease over my eyebrows. Yes, they are mostly plastic and the nose piece is not very comfortable on me. With all that, I still like them, as sleep is very important.
customer_reviews.author: S K Hoppe

customer_reviews.title: WOW! What a change!
customer_reviews.text: I received my glasses on Friday afternoon. I used them for a couple of hours and got so much more focused work done that I was hooked. My wife asked me what they were and I told her about them. She tried them on and did some reading and asked me to order her a pair. I've had them for 2 full days and have been in "crunch time" working on my Master's Degree with a ton of computer and printed book reading. I have gotten more done in a deeper focus than without.
customer_reviews.author: S. Andert

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quick delivery, and the glasses also. They fit right over my prescription glasses, and after wearing them just three nights for two hours before going to bed, I seem to be getting more restful sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Frank W. Foote

customer_reviews.title: Great for night time driving
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for night-time driving. They fit comfortably over my glasses and do not affect my peripheral vision. I am red/green deficient, but I notice more reds and greens when I am wearing them. They reduce the glare of the otherwise annoyingly bright headlights (both xenon bulb and LEDs) which removes all the stress of night-time driving for me.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glasses to fit over my regular glasses and use them when I go outdoors. They fit well and are convenient to put on and take off. I do not use them for sleeping and fail to understand why a rating is asked for in this category. Iff you wear glasses and do not want to go to the expense of buying prescription sun glasses, this product is an excellent alternative.
customer_reviews.author: John Martin

customer_reviews.title: A good find!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very concerned about all the harmful blue light we take in. As someone with beginning macular degeneration, I have been looking for ways to significantly reduce the amount of blue light exposure. These lightweight, easy-to-wear anti-blue blocking computer glasses are an important part of that effort. I'm so happy with the glasses that I immediately bought a second pair to have them easily accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: These Blue Blocking Computer Glasses Get the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: Glasses fit comfortably over my prescription reading glasses, are flexible and have survived my falling asleep and rolling over on them several times, but most of all they do an excellent job of blocking the blue light as I have no problems falling asleep and getting some much needed shut eye after looking at a computer screen all day and up to 16 hours a day easily. My only question is where have these glasses been all of my life. I now have 3 pairs for my home- at 2 work stations and on my bedside. Much appreciation for an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyne Ivery

customer_reviews.title: The side pieces keep falling off
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the glasses and they were good for driving, but when I took them off and put them in a sunglass case clipped to my purse, one of both side pieces would fall off. I did not enjoy clipping them back on, but the issue really was that eventually the loose side piece would get lost. I had two pairs from different sides and now I have two sets of glasses with two side pieces, each of which was for the left side of the glasses. I give up!
customer_reviews.author: Phylis K. Stein

customer_reviews.title: So soothing...like lotion for your eyeballs! :P
customer_reviews.text: Seriously...the difference my eyes feel now looking at/between the television, laptop & tablet is remarkable I've tried a fair amount of types/brands of "blue light" blocking lenses and feel these really work superior. Aside from the lenses, the fit/feeling over my other glasses is nearly undetectable. The frames are lightweight, yet seemingly well constructed. Time will tell. All in all, I highly recommend these to anyone looking for blue light protection with your current prescription glasses/readers. [ I received no compensation for this review. ]
customer_reviews.author: Dagon & Angel Whistler

customer_reviews.title: I'm delighted!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses do exactly what they are supposed to do. They fit nicely over my glasses and allow me to use a screen in the evening but still get a good night's sleep. I looked at numerous products, read a ton of reviews, and finally chose these. They block a lot more blue than most of the other choices. I was worried they might be too dark, but they're not. Also, the lens color is part of the lens, not a coating, so it won't rub off when you clean them.
customer_reviews.author: Alan W.

customer_reviews.title: Take some getting used to
customer_reviews.text: These glasses remove a whole lot of glare and make it easier to see in bright sunlight. What takes some getting used to is the color shift. Everything is brighter even though changed. If you have trouble handling sunlight glare these may well be for you. Just be mindful that it may take some getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Kachelmyer

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical at first, but super impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first, but I’m super impressed!! I wear them a couple of hours before bed if I’m watching my iPad or playing on my phone, and I can tell a huge difference when I get ready to actually go to sleep. I def recommend them if you have a hard time falling asleep because you watch tv before bed!
customer_reviews.author: Kallie Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These blue blocking glasses are exactly what I needed. They fit comfortably over my prescription lenses and are light weight. I can already tell a difference in my sleep pattern after only a few days of wearing these in the evening while watching TV and using the computer. Great Product!!! Great Vendor!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S

customer_reviews.title: Great product, really works!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are well made and fit over my prescription glasses comfortably. More importantly, they work! Although the orange color is not always useful for a graphic designer like myself, they are invaluable for surfing on the web, reading or other computer activity where recognizing accurate color does not matter. As far as I can tell from research, the orange color gives the most benefit, more than the clear lenses. I had started to read digital books on my iPad and found that it was really disturbing my sleep patterns. As soon as I started using these glasses, my eyes were more rested, and the sleep issues were no longer a problem. I try to use them whenever I can.
customer_reviews.author: mlcro

customer_reviews.title: NOT a disappointment / relaxes eyes instantaneously!
customer_reviews.text: The glasses arrived when promised.. the quality was heavy duty.. better than expected. The lenses fit nicely over any pair of eyeglasses and/they can still stay on my head without glasses undeaprneath.. the lenses give you an immediate sens of relaxation and calmness.. plus the protective covering that used to ensure no scatches on arrival.. worked.. 5 star selle for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: he falls asleep faster and sleeps better. He wears a larger pair of bifocals and ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears these for about an hour before bed and finds them to really help him sleep more. He reads with a Nook and watches TV before bed and was having trouble falling asleep. Once he started wearing the Fitover glasses, he falls asleep faster and sleeps better. He wears a larger pair of bifocals and the glasses don't fit over them perfectly, but he says they work and he's happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: charged in NFalls

customer_reviews.title: Definitely stops screen glare on computers and smart phones.
customer_reviews.text: These slipped over my prescriptive glasses perfectly, are light weight, and stayed in place without requiring any continuous readjustment. They definitely stopped screen glare from my computer and my smart phone. The product was shipped in a reusable drawstring case that can be used to protect the glasses either between uses or packed for travel.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Distorted view
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought them for my mom to wear over her glasses to see if they would help cut her headaches down since having her stroke.. They fit well over her glasses but distorted her view making everything wavy and just adding to her headache. *Update* The customer service for this company is wonderful. They contacted me concerned about the poor experience we had wit their product and concerned we might have received a faulty pair. I am impressed. I am increasing the star rating because of their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: mblucky0816

customer_reviews.title: Awesome glasses
customer_reviews.text: It really is a game changer. It doesnt stress my eyes nearly as much and it helps me get great sleep. The screens strained my eyes so it helped me stay up later but now the glasses relax me so much im doing off mid game. The sleep quality is great. They are very lightweight and comfortable too. They fit right over your glasses.
customer_reviews.author: L. Presley

customer_reviews.title: better sleep
customer_reviews.text: These blue blocker glasses came very quickly. They fit over regular glasses very well. I started using them for 2-3 hours before retiring and slept the through the night, which suggests melatonin is indeed increasing by using them. I now am using them earlier in the afternoon, since they cut any glare from TV and computer screens. Very happy with the purchase. I recommended them to a friend yesterday for possible relief from headaches (blue light and migraines).
customer_reviews.author: cookie lover

customer_reviews.title: Saving my eyesight!
customer_reviews.text: So glad that I ordered these blue-light filtering glasses. They fit perfectly over my regular prescription lenses and were super easy to adjust to fit - just stick under hot running water and they bend simply to make them fit better. They are super light-weight also. Because they are slightly tinted, they do cause a little blur to vision but after a bit I don't notice it. I'm a teacher and the current digital platform for learning means I am on my computer far more than normal so these glasses are a god-send.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I do like these. The lenses seem to be quality, with no visual distortion. They do fit over my reader glasses well. Yes, they add some weight on your nose, but they are probably as light as they can be. I will likely buy again. My eyes do seem to have less irrtation after I've been looking at a computer screen and tv for hours at a time.
customer_reviews.author: cactus

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FIT-OVER glasses COMFY and Look like Normal Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Very frustrated at *AMAZON* that only 1 month after trying this inexpensive pair that works SO well by ElementsActive, WANTING to buy 2 more pairs -- Amazon says it's unavailable now. These actually Look Normal-- like sunglasses. Fit over prescription & "Walmart magnifying eyeglasses" very well. Cuts LOT of blue light & actually makes TV colors look more rich. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DianaDee

customer_reviews.title: Daily Use
customer_reviews.text: I have two pair of these and leave one out in the living room and one in the computer room. I use them for all computer, tv and phone use. They are comfortable. I've fallen asleep with them over my glasses. They're fairly sturdy. Sometimes the arm pops off, and I pop it back into place. They help make screens easier on my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: AutumnElf

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BLUE LIGHT PROTECTION, LOVE THEM!!!
customer_reviews.text: They somewhat protected my eyes from blue light stress when I was playing solitaire before going to sleep. It gave me a better quality of sleep because of that!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Blanket

customer_reviews.title: These really helped me to get a good nights sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these glasses especially when reading my Kindle before bedtime. I was having many sleep issues but from the very first night I slept much better. It was recommended by my doctor to wear them for four hours before going to sleep. I thought I would mind wearing them for so long but I quickly found out they were no problem. They are reasonably priced and arrived in two days thanks to Prime. I would recommend them to anyone having problems sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous 1

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and they do the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mother because she is always on her phone and it zaps her energy and messes up her sleep. She wears glasses so these are great as they slip right over them. My dad loved them so much I just bought him a pair.
customer_reviews.author: L.G.F.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with insomnia. I read that blue light blocking glasses might help. I was skeptical but decided to give them a try. I am amazed that they do help. I have been able to go to sleep soon after going to bed since I have been wearing these glasses in the evenings, rather than remaining awake for an hour or more.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: I like them for the fact that they cover my regular ...
customer_reviews.text: I like them for the fact that they cover my regular glasses easily. They shield my eyes from glare, and my screen does not keep me awake or stop me falling asleep. I have to be careful to keep them on my desk and not walk around with them on, as they do change regular colors and make it a little strange trying to walk about in low light. I love the soft case they came in to protect them from scratches. Well designed and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A.

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I am sold on the concept of blocking blue light prior to bedtime. I find that I fall asleep faster and sleep sounder when I pay heed to my circadian rhythms. These are the third pair of light-blocking glasses I've owned and they are by far the best. They are both lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bismark

customer_reviews.title: The Best of the Blue-Blocking Glasses (that I've tried)
customer_reviews.text: I put these blue-blocking glasses over my prescription lenses a couple hours before bedtime. They do the job well, with minimal visual distortion. The lenses are superior quality compared to other blue-blocking glasses that I previously tried. The frames are rather weak, light-weight plastic, but still I recommend these glasses as the best ones that I've found- at least, so far.
customer_reviews.author: P. C. Brock

customer_reviews.title: These glasses rock!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with these glasses I'm going to be ordering a second pair. I've only been using them for a week but my eyes aren't burning, nor are they as as dry (which will make my eye doctor happy). I wear them for the computer day and evening, then for my tablet and Kindle at night. I'm falling asleep faster and sleeping longer.
customer_reviews.author: BarbCT

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP, DISTORTED GLASSES
customer_reviews.text: I liked the eye strain relief, but that was about all I liked! They scratch easily, the arms come off frequently, the bridge pinched my nose, and they wound up causing headaches more often than not! I wound up buying a different pair from Wal-Mart that work SO much better & cover the corners...they're light-weight, (as compared with these glasses,) and they're much sturdier--the arms NEVER fall off!
customer_reviews.author: S0u1s8vr

customer_reviews.title: Cuts down the glare from my computer screen.
customer_reviews.text: I have macular degeneration in one eye. Blue light rays breaks down the macula,so it is imperative in preserving my left eye, to cut down on computer screen glare. I bought these glasses for this purpose,to fit over my existing glasses. I have them on now as I type. They are light weight, comfortable and do a great job of cutting down the glare. I am more than pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent seller
customer_reviews.text: The amber color of these glasses bothered my eyes and when I first tried to watch TV with them got a headache. I did notice the text on the computer was clearer. However the amber color did not suit my eyes and the seller is giving a refund, and I will give the glasses to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: The frame quality is a big problem
customer_reviews.text: Look at the picture and you know what kind of rating it deserves...
customer_reviews.author: Jim from MA

customer_reviews.title: Best glasses ever
customer_reviews.text: I just received my glasses a couple of days ago and I already love them. I wear them watching TV and when I am on my iPad. My eyes are not tired and red like they used to be. I even slept through the night which is not normal for me. They fit comfortably over my prescription glasses too. I’m so glad I bought these. I tried a pair from another company and they broke after wearing them 4 or 5 times. These glasses are made much better. Thank you. Eroca T.
customer_reviews.author: Eroca

product_meta.title: ElementsActive Fitover Anti-Blue Blocking Computer Glasses | Fits Over Prescription Eyeglasses | Amber Orange to Block Blue Light | Better Night Sleep & Reduce Eyestrain Migraine Headaches Insomnia
product_meta.description:
Material Type:95blublockAdd yours to add now to give it a try! ElementsActive offers 100% FIT and SATISFACTION GUARANTEE! Send us an email info@elementsactive.com if you have any issues!



 NO MORE migraines, headaches, eye fatigue / strain from looking at the computer for more than an hour. Protect your eyes with ElementsActive Fitover Blue Blocker computer glasses. 



 Why is Blocking Blue Light So Important? Blue light doesn't focus on the retina which is the focusing screen of the eye whereas other colors focus close to the retina. When you "block blue light" you eliminate this problem. Objects appear clearer, sharper, and well defined. You get amazing clarity and the best protection with high-definition lenses.



 WEAR OVER STYLE - For fitting over existing prescription glasses wearers. The high-definition lenses block blue light, giving you a level of protection and clarity



 IS A REGULAR LENS WITH A SPECIAL COATING? No. it is made with a special blue-light blocking polymer that is directly incorporated into the lens materials. That means the blue- blocking technology won’t chip or wear away. By absorbing blue light, this polymer prevents blue light from passing through the lens to your eye. 



 HOW DOES BLUE LIGHT AFFECT THE EYES? Prolonged exposure to high-energy visible (HEV) blue light can cause eye strain and blurred vision. Studies have shown that it can also cause damage to the retinal cells which can lead to an increased risk of developing age-related macular degeneration. Macular degeneration leads to vision loss over time.block blue light and provide maximum UV coverage to protect your eyes.



ABOUT ElementsActive Brand: We specialize in over glasses eyewear for those who wear prescription glasses, and are frustrated with not being able to wear specialized eyewear such as these.
feature_bullets: PROTECT YOUR EYES - The ElementsActive Fitover Blue Blockers are safe to wear over your existing Rx prescription or reading eyeglasses (or without) to reduce eye fatigue, insomnia and macular degeneration from using electronic devices that emit harmful blue light.

EXTRA AMBER - Orange Amber Lenses block blue light more effectively than any other competing computer glasses that uses more lighter yellow lenses. This blue blocking lens technology will reduce eyestrain, muscle fatigue, headaches, migraine triggered by absorption of harmful blue emission from various screen displays.

SLEEP BETTER - Helps promote sleep hormones called melatonin by reducing blue light. Using the computer tablet or phone after daylight is gone disturbs melatonin production which interrupts your sleep cycle.

FLEXIBLE FRAME (2nd gen) - Since June 2018, our frames use a NEWER frame material that is extremely flexible, durable yet light at the same time. Compared to other brands that could break easily after a few uses, the ElementsActive frame is practically indestructible even if you throw them against the wall or accidentally bend the frame, so you don't have to baby it. Great for teenagers and kids!

GREAT FOR LONG OFFICE HOURS / GAMING SESSIONS - Save your eyes from damage staring at the screen for hours (eg. Long office hours , videogaming sessions LAN party). INCLUDES 100% FIT GUARANTEE : If you are not 100% satisfied we will refund you no questions asked! Just email us directly info@hselements.com instead of returning to Amazon. HSElements is the ORIGINAL creator of this Fitover Blue Blocker Style in Canada
